info.title: ZONNY API
info.description: Swagger documentation of the official API of ZONNY.

get.summary: Get information about the current User
get.description: All informations are not necessarily full.

put.description: Allow the user to update his Facebook credentials.

parameters.name: fb_access_token
parameters.description: User Facebook token

parameters.name: expiration_datetime_token
parameters.description: User Facebook token expiration datetime

post.description: Allow the user to create an account from his Facebook one.

parameters.name: fb_access_token
parameters.description: User Facebook token

parameters.name: expiration_datetime_token
parameters.description: User Facebook token expiration datetime

delete.description: Allow the user to delete all his information.

put.description: Allow the user to be unavailable until the specified datetime. Anybody will see the user on the map.

parameters.name: datetime
parameters.description: Datetime until which the user will be unavailable. The datetime must be in the next 24h.

put.description: Allow the user to be available again.

get.description: Allow the user to update his current location.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: User's decimal latitude

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: User's decimal longitude

put.description: Allow the creator of a public event to respond to a request.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Id of the request.

parameters.name: response
parameters.description: Answer to the request. 1 the creator accepts it. 2 the creator ignores it.

post.description: Allow to the user asking his friend if he can comes to a public event created by the latter.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: Id of the event.

delete.description: Allow to the user to delete his request to this event.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: Id of the event.

put.description: Allow the user to edit his event.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: Id of the event which the user wants to edit.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Desired name of the event.

parameters.name: public
parameters.description: If the event is public or not. 1 if true. 0 if false. If the event is public, all creator's friends would be able to see some information about the event.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the event. If null, the latitude will be the equidistant point between all guests (including the creator).

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the event. If null, the latitude will be the equidistant point between all guests (including the creator).

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Datetime of the event's start. The datetime must be in the next 24h.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Datetime of the event's end. The datetime must be in the next 24h after the event's start.

parameters.name: information
parameters.description: The creator can give more information concerning the event.

parameters.name: picture_url
parameters.description: The picture of the event. If null, it will be replaced by a default one.

parameters.name: invited_friends_id
parameters.description: The guests'ids separated by coma. Example: 1378,15256,145

parameters.description: Id of the event.

parameters.description: Id of the event.

parameters.description: Id of the event.

parameters.description: Number of desired page. Start to 1.

get.description: Return all user's friend and the consideration of the user for each one.

put.description: Allow the user to consider a friend as a good one or not.

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: Id of the considered friend.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: 1 if the friend is considered as a good friend. Otherwise, 0.

get.description: Get all information concerning the friend. Depending of the relation between the user and the friend, all, partial or any information could be returned (Error in the last case).

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: Id of the considered friend.

200.description: successful request. Could be a GoodFriend or NormalFriend model.

get.summary: Get all elements to show on the Map

profile_picture_url.description: URL of the user's profile picture

user_id.description: The user_id of the relation's owner

friend_id.description: The friend_id of whose the relation is concerning

relation.description: The relation value. 1 if the user has considered the friend has a good one. Otherwise, 0

expire.description: The expiration datetime of the Facebook Token

unavailable.description: The datetime until the user is unavailable

location_last_ckeck_up.description: The datetime when the user sent his last known position

start_time.description: When the event starts. Must be in the next 24h

end_time.description: When the event ends. Must be in the next 24h after the beginning of the event

information.description: More details given by the creator

percentage_remaining.description: Actual percentage remaining of the total duration of the event

event_id.description: The id of the concerning event

invited_friend_id.description: The id of the friend in question

response.description: Response of the concerning friend. 0 the friend has not answered yet. 1 the friend has answered he comes. 2 the friend doesn't come

creator.description: If the friend is the creator of the event or not. 1 is true. 0 is false

event_id.description: The id of the concerning event

friend_id.description: The id of the concerning friend who wants to come to this event

response.description: The response of the creator concerning this request. 0 the creator has not respond yet. 1 the creator has invited his friend. 2 the creator ignored this request.

review.description: The mark of the place. Min 1. Max 5

percentage_remaining.description: Actual percentage remaining of the total duration of the event

code.description: The code of the corresponding error. Useful to translate the error in the application
